item.title: 508/525 Actionbuttons.java
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

I added quest tab case to actionbuttons.java, They all used to work before, but now only teleports work.
KDR and Networth Doesnt work. It gives me 2 Errors in Compile. cant seem to find it. Maybe im blind but could someone help me?

case 274: if (buttonId == 13) { if (p.attackedBy != null) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command while in combat."); return; } p.teleportTo(3093, 3494, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "<col=FFFFFF>You teleported Home."); } if (buttonId == 14) { if (p.attackedBy != null) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command while in combat."); return; } p.teleportTo(2932, 4377, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "<col=FFFFFF>You teleported To Corporeal Beast."); } if (buttonId == 15) { if (p.attackedBy != null) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command while in combat."); return; } p.teleportTo(2269, 4680, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "<col=FFFFFF>You teleported To lair of King Black Dragon."); } if (buttonId == 17) { if (p.attackedBy != null) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command while in combat."); return; } p.teleportTo(3485, 9515, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "<col=FFFFFF>You teleported To Kalphite Queen Lair."); } if (buttonId == 18) { if (p.attackedBy != null) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command while in combat."); return; } p.teleportTo(2861, 9782, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "<col=FFFFFF>You teleported To Tormented Demon."); } if (buttonId == 19) { if (p.attackedBy != null) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command while in combat."); return; } p.teleportTo(2871, 5308, 2, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "<col=FFFFFF>You teleported To Godwars."); } if (buttonId == 20) { if (p.attackedBy != null) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command while in combat."); return; } p.teleportTo(2545, 4715, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "<col=FFFFFF>You teleported To Mage Bank Pk, Pull the lever to Pk."); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "<col=FFFFFF>You will get no Kill Points Here."); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "<col=FFFFFF>You can Team Battle Here. <|Danger Zone|>"); } if (buttonId == 21) { if (p.attackedBy != null) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command while in combat."); return; } p.teleportTo(3166, 3679, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "<col=FFFFFF>Welcome to Bounty Hunter."); } if (buttonId == 22) { if (p.attackedBy != null) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command while in combat."); return; } if (p.rights == 0) { p.teleportTo(2679, 3402, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "<col=FFFFFF>Welcome to Chill zone."); } if (p.donator > 0) { p.teleportTo(2346, 3171, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "<col=FFFFFF>Welcome to Donator zone."); } if (p.rights > 0) { p.teleportTo(2636, 9912, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "<col=FFFFFF>Welcome to Staff Zone."); } if (buttonId == 23) { if (p.attackedBy != null) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command while in combat."); return; } p.teleportTo(3273, 3687, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "<col=FFFFFF>Welcome to Clan Wars."); } if (buttonId == 24) { if (p.attackedBy != null) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command while in combat."); return; } p.teleportTo(2442, 3089, 0, 0, 0, 8939, 8941, 1576, 0, 1577, 0); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "<col=FFFFFF>Welcome to Castle Wars."); } if (buttonId == 26) { if (p.attackedBy != null) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot view this while in combat."); return; } double KDR = ((double)p.KC)/((double)p.DC); p.requestForceChat2("My Kill/Death ratio is "+p.KC+"/"+p.DC+"; "+KDR+"."); } if (buttonId == 27) { if (p.attackedBy != null) { p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You cannot use this command while in combat."); return; } try { long networth = 0; for (int i = 0; i < p.equipment.length; i++) { networth += p.getItemValue(p.equipment[i]) * p.equipmentN[i]; } for (int i = 0; i < p.items.length; i++) { networth += p.getItemValue(p.items[i]) * p.itemsN[i]; } for (int i = 0; i < p.bankItems.length; i++) { networth += p.getItemValue(p.bankItems[i]) * p.bankItemsN[i]; } int colour = networth > 0 ? 336600 : 991100; p.message("Your net worth is <col=ff0000>"+networth+"</col> gold."); } catch (Exception e) { p.message("Syntax error."); } } break;
Errors:

..:: Compile Activated ::.. .\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\ActionButtons.java:254: orphaned case case 591: ^ .\net\com\codeusa\net\packethandler\ActionButtons.java:1853: reached end of file while parsing } ^ 2 errors ..:: Compiled Completely. ::.. Press any key to continue . . .
